ygData.subject: Re: Necros soloing (OT)
ygData.msgSnippet: Melee can power level much faster than casters...  A caster will always need mana to kill anything.  A melee with enough twinked armor and a super weapon can
ygData.messageBody:
Melee can power level much faster than casters... A caster will
always need mana to kill anything. A melee with enough twinked armor
and a super weapon can kill a camain with a bubble of hp. A twinked
melee with a lot of cash can pay someone to walk behind him and heal.

The best way to superpower level is to get damage shields from high levels
on you. 24 damage each time you get hit... stuff dies fast.

Also, ... usually you do not power level off a random spawn very well.
Caiman are random spawns... ickie. Better to find an NPC with a very
quick spawn rate in your level range. Stuff like the dwarves or elves
in OOT are favorites for necro's.



>
> From: "Dark" <jackal@...>
>
> Quite credible. It's definitly possible.
>
> Naeeldar
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 <g4mntofcr@...>
> To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
> Date: Wednesday, January 19, 2000 2:06 PM
> Subject: [eqbards] Necros soloing (OT)
>
>
> >From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
> >
> >The other day I was in Cazic deep in the sewers with a pretty good pickup
> >group. I was the lowest at 31st level. We only had five people in the
> >group so when a 34 necro shouted he wanted to join a party I told him we
> had
> >a spot. When the necro joined the party, he told us that that he had
> almost
> >no experience fighting in groups before. He stated that he had soloed all
> >the way from 1st level to 34th level and only had 10 days played time. He
> >stated that only now since he was at 34th did he find it necessary to join
> >groups to get good EXP. I have heard that necros were the best at soloing
> >so I had trouble believing what he said. I am 31st level with 29 days
> >played time. A friend of mine is a 36 enchanter with 50 days played time.
> >Someone in the party asked him if he had friends that helped him powerlevel
> >to 34th. He said that he had done it all by himself and that he just knew
> >the right places to camp. Does this sound credible that a necro can solo
> to
> >34th in only 10 days played time?
> >
> >Galtin of E'ci
> >
> >
> >
